title: Love Letters To Kellie- My Boyfriend Won't Bond With My Child
description: Kellie gives her advice to listeners who have problems in love. I have a child from a previous relationship and my boyfriend never formed a bond… Can I get him to engage with her?
itunes:author: YEA Networks
itunes:subtitle: Kellie gives her advice to listeners who have problems in love. I have a child from a previous relationship and my boyfriend never formed a bond… Can I get him to engage with her?
